mean_cn: adj. 共和国的，共和政体的；  n. 共和主义者
mean_en: a person who supports a form of government with a president and politicians elected by the people and with no king or queen
sentence: The United States has a republican form of government.
word_etyma: re一再，重新 + public社会 + an形容词后缀，表人 → 全新的社会 → republican共和国的；共和党人
